detail_desc: Calf-length, V-neck dress in jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and detachable tie belt. Short, wide sleeves and concealed pockets in the side seams. Partly lined.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, small stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Side pockets and narrow ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem. Fleece lining.
Beret in a soft, fine knit.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly, low crotch and tapered legs with sides stripes.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch dobby weave with peak lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, welt front pockets with a flap and three inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Set in soft cotton jersey with a dress and leggings. Patterned dress with long sleeves and gathered tiers to the hem. Unlined. Ribbed, ankle-length leggings with an elasticated waist.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue, loop at the back, elasticated lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Pile linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Bucket bag in braided paper straw with a shoulder strap, drawstring at the top and zipped inner compartment. Lined. Diameter approx 17 cm, width 21 cm, height 22 cm.
Tailored trousers in a soft weave with two pairs of hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Welt back pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in creases.

Set with a triangle bikini top and bikini bottoms. Top with a double frill at the front, removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps with a frill trim and ties at the back. Bikini bottoms with a low waist, frill trim at the top and high cut at the back.

Short dress in an airy, patterned weave in a narrow cut at the top with short, braided shoulder straps. Opening at the front and an opening with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Gathered seam at the waist and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Shirt in a soft weave with a grandad collar, decorative chest pocket with a button and long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs. Gently rounded hem.
Pyjamas in jersey made from a cotton blend. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.
Boxy jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a V-neck at the front, small V-neck at the back and long sleeves that narrow to the cuffs.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with embroidery, an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, and side and back pockets. Contrasting colour jersey lining.
Hairbands in soft jersey with a decorative twisted detail at the front.
Soft toy in soft velour with embroidery and a glittery appliqué. Removable satin dress that has a skirt with a layer of glittery tulle. Size approx. 25 cm.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
5-pocket jeans in dyed, superstretch denim with a high waist and skinny legs.
Short top in crinkled jersey with embroidery on the front. Wide neckline, decorative buttons down the front and narrow, covered elastication with a frill trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in woven fabric. High paper bag waist with wide elastication, a small frill trim and wide, detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Thigh-high over-the-knee socks in a soft, rib-knit modal blend.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Calf-length skirt in airy, jacquard-weave Tencel™ lyocell with a pattern in glittery threads. High waist with a wide waistband, wide ties at one side, and a concealed zip in the side. Flounces at the top for volume and movement, a seam with a small frill trim lower down and a wide, gathered lower section. Chiffon lining made from recycled polyester.

Slightly longer blouse in woven fabric with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and decorative gathers at the shoulders. Yoke with a pleat at the back for added width and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Short skirt in a sturdy weave containing some wool with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Gentle A-line style with a fake wrapover and decorative button at the front. Lined.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with ear flaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

V-neck dress in a patterned weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Flounce around the neckline and over the shoulders, long sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the hem. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie-belt, asymmetric cut and a flounce trim. Unlined.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist and skinny legs.
Shirt in an airy weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a flounce trim at the sides. One pair with an all-over print.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Straight-cut blouse in an airy viscose weave with a stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey.
5-pocket denim jeans with a multistretch function that stretches in four directions for full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Cropped top in crinkled jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps. Concealed elastication and a small frill trim at the top with an overlocked edge, and wide smocking at the hem.
Court shoes in imitation leather with pointed toes, satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Covered block heels 6 cm.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a wide ribbed hem.

Set with a hat and pair of mittens in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend. Hat with faux fur pompom on top and ear flaps with ties. Mittens (sizes 0-6 months without thumbs) with fold-down ribbing at the cuffs. Fleece lining.
Top in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with cuffs and extended hem in a cotton weave with buttons.
Sleeveless, V-neck top in jersey crêpe with pleats at the shoulders and centre front. Double layer at the top.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric. High waist with elastication at the back and gathered seams for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Straight-cut top in sequined mesh with a round neckline, short sleeves and straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. Jersey lining.
Windbreaker in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short shorts in soft twill with a high waist that is elasticated at the back and has pleats and a sewn-on tie belt at the front. Pockets in the side seams.
Straight-cut blouse in a slightly stretchy weave with a V-neck and short cap sleeves.
Sleeveless, backless satin jumpsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, a concealed zip in the side and wide, ankle-length legs. Lined.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Visible, gathered seam down the sleeves and back. Lined.
Trousers in a soft, fine-knit wool and recycled cashmere blend. High waist with covered elastication and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Fully lined, print-patterned swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps and a decorative gather at the top.
Hair clips in metal with a plastic surface.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Blouse in soft, double-weave organic cotton with a round neck and buttons down the back. Yoke at the top with embroidery front and back, and long sleeves with embroidery and narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey containing some linen with a small, pleated lace trim around the armholes and gathers in the sides for best fit.

Ankle-length trousers in crisp cotton seersucker. High paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Soft leather mules with fold-down heels and a concealed elastic gore in one side. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Bras in cotton jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cold shoulder dress in an airy weave with an elasticated flounce at the top, smocked bodice and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Unlined.
Short jersey dress with short sleeves and a bell-shaped skirt.

Jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with short, flounced sleeves and smocking at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow and tassels, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a double-layered drawstring hood with a wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sports socks in a cotton blend.
Mules in imitation suede with scallop-edged foot straps. One strap has covered elastication at one side. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.

Sandals in scuba fabric with an adjustable foot strap and heel strap with hook and loop fastenings, and a loop at the back. Embossed ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Platform trainers with imitation suede and imitation leather details. Padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Height of soles 6.5 cm.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Long cardigan in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the back of the neck, cuffs and hem. No buttons.
